title: IM 2 RP SHORT
body: i literally need 2 more rp to buy a 975 skin. i want to buy championship riven when it comes out, is there anything i can do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I hear the [gurus over at the Player Support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) like to help people out in similar situations, but you need to bring them an offering.

Word on the street is that they enjoy fine art of league of legends champions/skins/anything league related. Maybe you should draw something?
